short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds keyword trends to your Google search page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keyword Trends is a free Chrome extension that enhances the Google search page by displaying a keyword's relevance over time. This tool offers a detailed, zoomable chart, similar to those found on trading platforms like TradingView, and automatically classifies keyword trends as 'uptrend' or 'downtrend' using technical analysis methods commonly used in the finance industry.

It is useful for entrepreneurs, marketers, SEO experts, traders, and data enthusiasts. Each Google search now shows keyword trend data on the right, providing daily learning opportunities. This extension enables a deeper understanding of keyword market dynamics and improves long-term keyword tracking.

Upcoming improvements will allow for more comprehensive keyword research and include additional advanced features to further support SEO efforts for keyword optimization.
